General.Name: Beijing Changjiu Logistics Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Changjiu Logistics Co.,Ltd engages in the provision of supply chain logistics solutions for the automotive industry in China. The company offers road, rail, and water fright services; and finished vehicle logistics, warehousing, parts logistics, and social vehicle logistics services. It also provides supply chain finance for automotive logistics providers and car dealers; and operates a mobile platform to connect customers with carriers. It offers its services to OEMs and suppliers. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. Beijing Changjiu Logistics Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Jilin Changjiu Industry Group Co., Ltd.
